00053 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LDLM

00055 #include <lustre_dlm.h>
00056 #include <obd_support.h>
00057 #include <lustre_lib.h>

00059 #include "ldlm_internal.h"

00061 #ifdef HAVE_SERVER_SUPPORT
00062 
00071 static inline int
00072 ldlm_plain_compat_queue(struct list_head *queue, struct ldlm_lock *req,
00073                         struct list_head *work_list)
00074 {
00075         enum ldlm_mode req_mode = req->l_req_mode;
00076         struct ldlm_lock *lock;
00077         struct list_head *tmp;
00078         int compat = 1;
00079         ENTRY;
00080 
00081         lockmode_verify(req_mode);
00082 
00083         list_for_each_entry(lock, queue, l_res_link) {
00084                 /* We stop walking the queue if we hit ourselves so we don't
00085                  * take conflicting locks enqueued after us into account,
00086                  * or we'd wait forever. */
00087                 if (req == lock)
00088                         RETURN(compat);
00089 
00090                 /* Advance loop cursor to last lock of mode group. */
00091                 tmp = &list_entry(lock->l_sl_mode.prev, struct ldlm_lock,
00092                                   l_sl_mode)->l_res_link;
00093 
00094                 if (lockmode_compat(lock->l_req_mode, req_mode))
00095                         continue;
00096 
00097                 if (!work_list)
00098                         RETURN(0);
00099 
00100                 compat = 0;
00101 
00102                 /* Add locks of the mode group to \a work_list as
00103                  * blocking locks for \a req. */
00104                 if (lock->l_blocking_ast)
00105                         ldlm_add_ast_work_item(lock, req, work_list);
00106 
00107                 {
00108                         struct list_head *head;
00109 
00110                         head = &lock->l_sl_mode;
00111                         list_for_each_entry(lock, head, l_sl_mode)
00112                                 if (lock->l_blocking_ast)
00113                                         ldlm_add_ast_work_item(lock, req,
00114                                                                work_list);
00115                 }
00116         }
00117 
00118         RETURN(compat);
00119 }
00120 
00136 int ldlm_process_plain_lock(struct ldlm_lock *lock, __u64 *flags,
00137                             int first_enq, enum ldlm_error *err,
00138                             struct list_head *work_list)
00139 {
00140         struct ldlm_resource *res = lock->l_resource;
00141         struct list_head rpc_list;
00142         int rc;
00143         ENTRY;
00144 
00145         LASSERT(lock->l_granted_mode != lock->l_req_mode);
00146         check_res_locked(res);
00147         LASSERT(list_empty(&res->lr_converting));
00148         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&rpc_list);
00149 
00150         if (!first_enq) {
00151                 LASSERT(work_list != NULL);
00152                 rc = ldlm_plain_compat_queue(&res->lr_granted, lock, NULL);
00153                 if (!rc)
00154                         RETURN(LDLM_ITER_STOP);
00155                 rc = ldlm_plain_compat_queue(&res->lr_waiting, lock, NULL);
00156                 if (!rc)
00157                         RETURN(LDLM_ITER_STOP);
00158 
00159                 ldlm_resource_unlink_lock(lock);
00160                 ldlm_grant_lock(lock, work_list);
00161                 RETURN(LDLM_ITER_CONTINUE);
00162         }
00163 
00164  restart:
00165         rc = ldlm_plain_compat_queue(&res->lr_granted, lock, &rpc_list);
00166         rc += ldlm_plain_compat_queue(&res->lr_waiting, lock, &rpc_list);
00167 
00168         if (rc != 2) {
00169                 /* If either of the compat_queue()s returned 0, then we
00170                  * have ASTs to send and must go onto the waiting list.
00171                  *
00172                  * bug 2322: we used to unlink and re-add here, which was a
00173                  * terrible folly -- if we goto restart, we could get
00174                  * re-ordered!  Causes deadlock, because ASTs aren't sent! */
00175                 if (list_empty(&lock->l_res_link))
00176                         ldlm_resource_add_lock(res, &res->lr_waiting, lock);
00177                 unlock_res(res);
00178                 rc = ldlm_run_ast_work(ldlm_res_to_ns(res), &rpc_list,
00179                                        LDLM_WORK_BL_AST);
00180                 lock_res(res);
00181                 if (rc == -ERESTART)
00182                         GOTO(restart, rc);
00183                 *flags |= LDLM_FL_BLOCK_GRANTED;
00184         } else {
00185                 ldlm_resource_unlink_lock(lock);
00186                 ldlm_grant_lock(lock, NULL);
00187         }
00188         RETURN(0);
00189 }
00190 #endif /* HAVE_SERVER_SUPPORT */

00192 void ldlm_plain_policy_wire_to_local(const union ldlm_wire_policy_data *wpolicy,
00193                                      union ldlm_policy_data *lpolicy)
00194 {
00195         /* No policy for plain locks */
00196 }
00197 
00198 void ldlm_plain_policy_local_to_wire(const union ldlm_policy_data *lpolicy,
00199                                      union ldlm_wire_policy_data *wpolicy)
00200 {
00201         /* No policy for plain locks */
00202 }
